aparadha walakwima ha nithi aadhara sambandhayen kriyathmaka wima sandaha shri lankawa ha rusiyawa athara nawa giwisumakata elambaeyi.derate ihala pele niyojithayan athara pawathi sakachchawaka prathipalayak lesa me giwisuma athikara ganimata hakiwi thibena athara eya deratatama itha wadagath bawa widesha katayuthu amathyansha sanniwedana anshaye adhyaksha janaral sarath disanayaka mahatha pawasayi.aparadha manda pawathwima ha eeta adala naithika gatalu awama karaganima sambandhayen mehidi wadi awadhanayak yomu kerena bawath aasiyanu kalapayata menma rusiyawatada balapana wiwidha naithika karunu pilibanda sakachcha kala bawath ee mahatha kiya siti.aparadha walata sambandha derate pudgalayan sambandhayen kriyathmaka wana aakaraya saha yamkisi waradakata waradakaru wuwahoth ratawal deka athara samuhikawa kriyathmaka wima mehidi siduwana bawada adhyaksha janaralwaraya penwa deyi.yam heyakin waradak sambandhayen shri lankikayeku rusiyawedi waradakaruweku wuwahoth ohuta ho ayata eratadi nithi upades laba ganime hakiyawada me yatathe pawathina bawa sandahan kala sarath disanayaka mahatha ee haraha shri lankawa ha rusiyawa athara nithi upades huwamarukara ganima ha awashya awasthawanhidi manga penwim laba ganimatada haki bawa hethema awadharanaya karayi..
